attributes.action: Does it shame you to see MILLIONS of people going to the polls in India and Afghanistan when so few of our citizens vote in this country.
attributes.additional_details: And the reason people in this country don't vote any more is the futility of trying to break through the base corruptedness which pervades our political system which nowadays concerns itself only with the party politics necessary to keep our politicians where they are, regardless of what they do, even to the extent of abusing their office and undermining the rule of law and order to protect and keep dishonest criminal ministers among their number - ALL IN THE NAME OF PARTY POLITICS WHICH IS PRECISELY WHY PEOPLE OF THIS COUNTRY DON'T VOTE ANY MORE.
